title: Executive Order 4858-Extension of Trust Period on Allotments Made to the Prairie Band of Pottawatomi Indians in Kansas
content: It is hereby ordered under authority contained in the act of February 8, 1887 (24 Stat. 388-89), that the trust period on the allotments of the Prairie Band of Pottawatomi Indians in Kansas, which trust period expires during the calendar year 1928, be and is hereby extended for a period of ten years, with the exception of the following:
citation: Calvin Coolidge, Executive Order 4858-Extension of Trust Period on Allotments Made to the Prairie Band of Pottawatomi Indians in Kansas Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/277298
